item.title: Newb <--- 'Help' Unknown indentifer 'clickmscolour' in script
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

const
ChickColor=529507; // Color of the chickens. No white plz.
ChickColor2=000000; // Who cares? Color? White? No?
FeatherColor=000000; // Color of the feathers. No white plz.
Feather = true; // if feather TRUE then get feathers, false, not.
Waitty=3000; // Wait time between clicks.
ChickensToKill = 400; // Multiply amount by 12, Tsadam! Xp you get from kills!

You can freely change those, the first 3 constants are the colors you can set.

Read full topic

item.title: Newb <--- 'Help' Unknown indentifer 'clickmscolour' in script
item.dc:creator: @FcoKris FcoKris
item.description:
@FcoKris wrote:

well im tired and iv never done this before so heres the script im using i found it using the search function when i typed in chicken (i basicly want to farm feathers <.<)

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}

const
ChickColor=529507; // Color of the chickens. No white plz.
ChickColor2=000000; // Who cares? Color? White? No?
FeatherColor=000000; // Color of the feathers. No white plz.
Feather = true; // if feather TRUE then get feathers, false, not.
Waitty=3000; // Wait time between clicks.
ChickensToKill = 400; // Multiply amount by 12, Tsadam! Xp you get from kills!
Lol=0;// No, Don’t touch.
var
Chickenamount:integer;
lael:integer;

Procedure SetupMe;
begin
ClearDebug
setupsrl
end;

procedure ownage;
begin

repeat

if lol=1
then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor2,True);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=Chickenamount+1;
Lael:=lol-1;

if lol=0
then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor,true);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=ChickenAmount+1;
Lael:=lol+1;

if
Findnewbox then
Gamblenewbox;
if
Findnewbox then
LogOut;
case Feather of
True : begin
clickmscolor(FeatherColor,True);
wait(500+random(700));
end;
False:end;

repeat
until(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill);
if(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)then
end;
end;

procedure Report;
begin
Writeln(‘Jei jei KK"s Free Chicken Killer.’)
Writeln(‘Now Going on report.’)
Writeln(‘You have killed:’+inttostr(Chickenamount))
Writeln(‘Thank you for using & Choosing my Chicken Killer.’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupMe;
repeat
ownage;
Report;
until(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)
if (Chickenamount=ChickensToKill) then
Writeln(‘End of script. Assignment done.’)
end.
[/scar]

Line 32: [Error] (16406:1): Unknown identifier ‘ClickMsColor’ in script <— I get this error in every script I try to run (only tryed to run chicken ones)
I understand how to select my colour via eye drop
now my problem is I dont know where to place the numbers given when I select them or how\in what way I get somthing along the lines of 1140568 at (280, 392)
but where do I place this? could somone please copy the script and point out in bold where I should be placeing these numbers so for future scrips I can just repeat the process?
thanks in advance

Read full topic
